attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the The petition that you have opened for me under http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/removephoneboxes/
Cannot be accessed via the WWW.
In giving people the above address they  are unable to sign on to the petition.
Can you please resolve the problem.
Thanks 
Denise Julien

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
